remark.ch: 第一次上課請務必到S1-503教室進行分組

goal.en: Learn new science knowledge and how to do scientific presentation, Exchange ideas with peer students, Review one‘s professional knowledge.
goal.ch: 學習科學新知與科學知識的表達方式， 學習如何與同儕交流， 檢視化學專業知識。

content.en:
A 25-35 minute-presentation for one assigned SCI paper about chemistry (published after 2022 with Impact Factor > 6), followed by a 5-10 minute questioning session.
After the presentation, you need to e-mail your Power Point file to the instructing professor on the same date (before 11:00 pm).
content.ch:
每位同學報告30 ± 5分鐘；其他同學和老師發問5-10分鐘。
當周報告的同學請於報告當天晚上11點前，將報告檔案(Power Point 投影片) email給任課教師。
論文的選擇需同時符合以下規定:(1)需和化學相關，次領域不限。(2)為SCI期刊且Impact Factor 高於6。(3)出版年份需為西元2022年以後。

textbook.en: As described in “Course Description“ based primarily on articles published in international journals.
textbook.ch: 如授課內容所述,主要以國際期刊論文為主。

grading.en: Oral presentation (40％), Content of PPT (40％), Response toward questions (10％), Attendance (10％).
grading.ch: 口頭陳述報告(40％)， 投影片內容(40％)， 問題回覆(10％)， 出席率(10％)。
